name: Ext.grid.selection.Selection
doc:
Base class for selections which may be of three subtypes:

  • Cells A rectangular range of cells defined by a start record/column and an end record/column.
  • Rows An array of records.
  • Columns An array of columns in which all records are included.

members.name: clear
members.doc: Clears the selection represented by this selection object.
members.short_doc: Clears the selection represented by this selection object. ...

members.name: eachCell
members.doc: Calls the passed function for each selected cell from top left to bottom right iterating over columns within each row.

params.name: fn
params.doc: The function to call. If this returns false, the iteration is halted with no further calls.

properties.name: columnIndex
properties.doc: The column index of the current cell.

properties.name: rowIndex
properties.doc: The row index of the current cell.

params.name: scope
params.doc: The context (this reference) in which fn is executed. Defaults to this Selection object.

members.short_doc:
Calls the passed function for each selected cell from top left to bottom right
iterating over columns within each row. ...

members.name: eachColumn
members.doc: Calls the passed function for each selected column from left to right.

params.name: fn
params.doc: The function to call. If this returns false, the iteration is halted with no further calls.

properties.name: columnIndex
properties.doc: The index of the current column. Note that in a locked grid, this is relative to the outermost grid encompassing both sides.

params.name: scope
params.doc: The context (this reference) in which fn is executed. Defaults to this Selection object.

members.short_doc: Calls the passed function for each selected column from left to right. ...

members.name: eachRow
members.doc: Calls the passed function for each selected record.

params.name: fn
params.doc: The function to call. If this returns false, the iteration is halted with no further calls.

params.name: scope
params.doc: The context (this reference) in which the function is executed. Defaults to this Selection object.

members.short_doc: Calls the passed function for each selected record. ...

short_doc:
